WorkItem.Description:
"I don't understand why there is no CompositePresentationEvent that takes no type arguments.
 
I want to create a parameterless event such as UserLoggedInEvent that doesn't require any additional data, just an 'Action' delegate (parameterless).
 
I am not sure the non-generic should have been the base-class of the generic one, but it's an option."
 
More information here:
http://compositewpf.codeplex.com/discussions/253054
WorkItem.Summary: There should be a non-generic CompositePresentationEvent and EventSubscription.

Comments.Message:
Actually the whole EventAggregator system is too robust.
In my opinion there should only be 1 static class of EventAggregator that does everthing:

EventAggregator.Publish(additional args)

Read for more information here:
http://neverindoubtnet.blogspot.com/2009/07/simplify-prism-event-aggregator.html
http://codepaste.net/uf9isv
